Implementing an XML Normalisation Algorithm

Packages
uk.ac.ed.inf.proj.xmlnormaliser The root package
uk.ac.ed.inf.proj.xmlnormaliser.gui The package with GUI related classes
uk.ac.ed.inf.proj.xmlnormaliser.parser.dtd DTD Parsing
uk.ac.ed.inf.proj.xmlnormaliser.parser.fd XML FD Parsing Functional Dependency format: path1; path2 -> path3 Path format: parent.children.
uk.ac.ed.inf.proj.xmlnormaliser.validator XNF Validation (detecting trivial XFDs + computing the closure) and Transformation (moving attributes and creating new element types)
